Request.RequestParameters:
{"OrderID":1639605477,"UID":"D305560059","Eid":"s42289","SourceID":1,"SendCode":"23010022","AppID":110220,"Sender":"h_rsv@ctrip.com","Recipient":["qxsun@ctrip.com"],"SenderName":"Ctrip Hotel Reservation Dept.","RecipientName":"qxsun","Subject":"Hotel reservation successful (Best Western Linton Lodge)","BodyTemplateID":23010022,"BodyContent":"<entry><OrderID>1639605477</OrderID><IsCorpCorporation>F</IsCorpCorporation><HotelName>Best Western Linton Lodge(贝斯特韦斯特林顿酒店)</HotelName><ContactName>Sir/Madam</ContactName><UID>D30556****</UID><OrderDate>2016-01-02</OrderDate><HotelNameEn>Best Western Linton Lodge</HotelNameEn><ConfirmNO>381511824</ConfirmNO><HotelAdress>11-13 Linton Road,Oxford </HotelAdress><HotelTel>+441865553461</HotelTel><HotelFax></HotelFax><ClientName>zhao/yincui,li/yichen</ClientName><Arrival>2016-04-01 (begins at 03:00 p.m)</Arrival><Departure>2016-04-05 (before 11:00 a.m)</Departure><RoomName>Executive Double Room</RoomName><Quantity>1Room(s)</Quantity><MaxPerson>Maximum 2 guest(s)</MaxPerson><TotalPrice>GBP 495.00</TotalPrice><RoomPrice>GBP 412.50</RoomPrice><VATTax>GBP 82.5</VATTax><CityTax>GBP 0.00</CityTax><ServiceCharge>GBP 0.00</ServiceCharge><Breakfast>exclude breakfast</Breakfast><PaymentType>前台现付 (pay upon check out)</PaymentType><RoomCondition></RoomCondition><SpecialRequest></SpecialRequest><CancelPolicy>如果在入住日16：00 时前 取消预订，住宿方将不收取费用。 如果未如期入住或超出时限，取消预订住宿方将收取第一晚房费的100%。 </CancelPolicy><HotelPolicy>&lt;strong&gt;Hotel Policies&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;div style=&apos;padding:0 0 0px 5px;clear:both;text-align: left;font-size:13px;margin:10px 0 10px 0&apos;&gt;允许客人携带儿童入住。 所有额外入住的12岁以下的儿童，使用现有床铺不收费。 所有额外入住的2岁以下的儿童，加婴儿床不收费。 所有额外入住的年龄较大的儿童或者成人，加床的收费是每人每晚 GBP 10 。 最多容纳：每间客房1张加床/婴儿床。 &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div style=&apos;padding:0 0 0px 5px;clear:both;text-align: left;font-size:13px;margin:10px 0 10px 0&apos;&gt;住宿方于各处提供WiFi（免费）。 &lt;/div&gt;&lt;div style=&apos;padding:0 0 0px 5px;clear:both;text-align: left;font-size:13px;margin:10px 0 10px 0&apos;&gt;You have now confirmed and guaranteed your booking by credit card.&lt;br/&gt;All payments are to be made at the hotel during your stay,unless otherwise stated in the hotel policies or in the room conditions.&lt;br/&gt; Please note that your credit card may be pre-authorized prior to your arrival.&lt;br/&gt; &lt;br/&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div style=&apos;padding:0 0 0px 5px;clear:both;text-align: left;font-size:13px;margin:10px 0 10px 0&apos;&gt;酒店恕不接受单一性别团体的预订。
请注意，酒店恕不允许客人举办单一性别聚会以及其他聚会。客人必须年满21岁，或由监护人陪同。
客人可以在入住期间免费使用停车场，但入住前和退房后则需额外付费。
请注意，酒店的餐厅于2015年12月17日至19日期间的晚间关闭。&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div style=&apos;padding:0 0 0px 5px;clear:both;text-align: left;font-size:13px;margin:10px 0 10px 0&apos;&gt;无需预订：住宿场所可提供私人停车设施（免费）。 &lt;/div&gt;</HotelPolicy><FriendTip>&lt;strong&gt;Ctrip Points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;div style=&apos;padding:0 0 0px 5px;clear:both;text-align: left;font-size:13px;margin:10px 0 10px 0&apos;&gt;After your order has been completed, 4740 Ctrip points will be added to your account. For details on how Ctrip points work, click &lt;a href=&apos;http://pages.english.ctrip.com/webhome/purehtml/en/faq/points.html#11&apos;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;. &lt;/div&gt;</FriendTip><EmailDate>2016-01-25</EmailDate><PostAmount></PostAmount><LocalLanguageAddress></LocalLanguageAddress><RevManagerEmail></RevManagerEmail></entry>","IsBodyHtml":true,"Charset":"GB2312","ExpiredTime":"2016-02-26 13:13:51"}
